response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (21 years old)", "high", "Young age is associated with higher impulsivity and a higher risk of recidivism."],
    ["Gender (Male)", "high", "Males statistically tend to show higher rates of recidivism."],
    ["Arrest and Conviction History (4 arrests, convicted)", "high", "A history of multiple arrests and convictions strongly correlates with an increased risk of future reoffending."],
    ["Education (No high school diploma or GED)", "medium", "Lack of educational attainment can limit opportunities leading to higher stress and potential for recidivism."],
    ["Employment (Held 1 job during the year)", "medium", "Limited employment history may indicate instability which can contribute to recidivist behavior."],
    ["Social living (Living alone, never married)", "medium", "Lack of social support systems can increase risk by reducing accountability and support."],
    ["Substance Use (Marijuana use in past four years)", "medium", "Drug use is a risk factor due to its association with criminal behavior even if less severe compared to other substances."],
    ["Mental Health (Recent feelings of depression)", "medium", "Symptoms of depression can be linked to poor decision-making and may elevate recidivism risk."],
    ["Family/Environment (Raised in a larger urban household)", "medium", "Urban environments and larger households may introduce more complex social dynamics, potentially increasing stress and risk."],
    ["Religious Belief (Believes God influences his fate)", "low", "Religious belief is generally considered a protective factor or neutral and does not significantly increase recidivism risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 85
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 4 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs 165 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
